# Choking Sands (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]], [[5th Level Druid Spells|Druid 5]], [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 10]], [[BoXM 10th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 10]], [[BoXM 10th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a tiny stuffed animal filled with sand)

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Living creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous; see text

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude negates; see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Sandstorm (WotC), pg. 112

You coat the targetâ€™s lungs with dust and sand. The target can cough up the sand by taking a full-round action and making a Fortitude save. If it chooses not to do so, it must make Constitution checks to avoid suffocation.
